segment.source: Adding or Editing an Issue (Windows 10)
segment.target: Adding or Editing an Issue (Windows 10)

segment.source: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), you can enter information about the compatibility issues that you discover.
segment.target: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), you can enter information about the compatibility issues that you discover.

segment.source: Adding or Editing an Issue
segment.target: Adding or Editing an Issue

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 8
segment.target: Windows 8

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), you can enter information about the compatibility issues that you discover.
segment.target: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), you can enter information about the compatibility issues that you discover.

segment.source: You can use the Microsoft Compatibility Exchange to share compatibility information with others.
segment.target: You can use the Microsoft Compatibility Exchange to share compatibility information with others.

segment.source: For information about the Microsoft Compatibility Exchange, see Sending and Receiving Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For information about the Microsoft Compatibility Exchange, see Sending and Receiving Compatibility Data.

segment.source: Adding Issues for Your Applications and Websites
segment.target: Adding Issues for Your Applications and Websites

segment.source: You can view or add issues only for applications or websites.
segment.target: You can view or add issues only for applications or websites.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The following examples use the ApplicationName dialog box.
segment.target: The following examples use the ApplicationName dialog box.

segment.source: The procedures are similar for websites.
segment.target: The procedures are similar for websites.

segment.source: To add an issue
segment.target: To add an issue

segment.source: On the OperatingSystem - Application Report screen, double-click the name of the application to display the ApplicationName dialog box.
segment.target: On the OperatingSystem - Application Report screen, double-click the name of the application to display the ApplicationName dialog box.

segment.source: On the Actions menu, click Add Issue.
segment.target: On the Actions menu, click Add Issue.

segment.source: Enter the information from the following table, and then click Save.
segment.target: Enter the information from the following table, and then click Save.

segment.source: Field
segment.target: Field

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Title
segment.target: Title

segment.source: Can be up to 256 characters in length.
segment.target: Can be up to 256 characters in length.

segment.source: Priority
segment.target: Priority

segment.source: You must select a value from the list.
segment.target: You must select a value from the list.

segment.source: Severity
segment.target: Severity

segment.source: You must select a value from the list.
segment.target: You must select a value from the list.

segment.source: Symptom
segment.target: Symptom

segment.source: You must select a value from the list.
segment.target: You must select a value from the list.

segment.source: Cause
segment.target: Cause

segment.source: You must select a value from the list.
segment.target: You must select a value from the list.

segment.source: Affected Operating Systems
segment.target: Affected Operating Systems

segment.source: Operating systems on which the issue occurs.
segment.target: Operating systems on which the issue occurs.

segment.source: You must select at least one operating system.
segment.target: You must select at least one operating system.

segment.source: Issue Description
segment.target: Issue Description

segment.source: Description of the issue, including the steps to reproduce the problem.
segment.target: Description of the issue, including the steps to reproduce the problem.

segment.source: Link to More Information
segment.target: Link to More Information

segment.source: URL for a page that shows more information about the issue.
segment.target: URL for a page that shows more information about the issue.

segment.source: To edit an existing issue
segment.target: To edit an existing issue

segment.source: On the OperatingSystem - Application Report screen, double-click the name of the application that includes the issue you want to modify.
segment.target: On the OperatingSystem - Application Report screen, double-click the name of the application that includes the issue you want to modify.

segment.source: In the ApplicationName dialog box, click the Issues tab, and then double-click the specific issue to be edited.
segment.target: In the ApplicationName dialog box, click the Issues tab, and then double-click the specific issue to be edited.

segment.source: Modify the issue information, and then click Save.
segment.target: Modify the issue information, and then click Save.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can modify your own issues.
segment.target: You can modify your own issues.

segment.source: You cannot modify issues entered by another user.
segment.target: You cannot modify issues entered by another user.
